text: The precise style of British sovereigns has varied over the years. style is officially proclaimed in two languages:UK Parliament, Royal Titles Act 1953 (1 & 2 Eliz. 2 c. 9) Proclamation of 28 May 1953 made in accordance with the Royal Titles Act 1953. * in English: * in Latin: ==References== Category:Monarchy of the United Kingdom
title: Style of the British sovereign
